languages.text: "Это знак того, что оборона Даргонуса была организована более-менее эффективно. Налет друкари — тяжелое испытание для любого мира".
"It's a sign that the defence of Dargonus was organised relatively effectively. A Drukhari raid is a gruelling test for any world to endure."
languages.original_text: "Это знак того, что оборона Даргонуса была организована более-менее эффективно. Налет друкари — тяжелое испытание для любого мира".

traits.locale_text: "It's a sign that the defence of Dargonus was organised relatively effectively. A Drukhari raid is a gruelling test for any world to endure."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It's a sign that the defence of Dargonus was organised relatively effectively. A Drukhari raid is a gruelling test for any world to endure."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It's a sign that the defence of Dargonus was organised relatively effectively. A Drukhari raid is a gruelling test for any world to endure."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It's a sign that the defence of Dargonus was organised relatively effectively. A Drukhari raid is a gruelling test for any world to endure."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “这样的迹象表明达戈努斯的防御组织得比较有效。无论对什么样的世界而言，黑暗灵族的袭击都会是场严酷的考验。”
languages.original_text: "It's a sign that the defence of Dargonus was organised relatively effectively. A Drukhari raid is a gruelling test for any world to endure."

traits.locale_text: “这样的迹象表明达戈努斯的防御组织得比较有效。无论对什么样的世界而言，黑暗灵族的袭击都会是场严酷的考验。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « C'est plutôt le signe que les systèmes de défense de Dargonus sont relativement efficaces. Les mondes qui subissent les raids des Drukharis sont mis à très rude épreuve. »
languages.original_text: "It's a sign that the defence of Dargonus was organised relatively effectively. A Drukhari raid is a gruelling test for any world to endure."

traits.locale_text: « C'est plutôt le signe que les systèmes de défense de Dargonus sont relativement efficaces. Les mondes qui subissent les raids des Drukharis sont mis à très rude épreuve. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Es una señal de que la defensa de Dargonus estaba bien organizada. Una incursión Drukhari es una prueba atroz para cualquier planeta».
languages.original_text: "It's a sign that the defence of Dargonus was organised relatively effectively. A Drukhari raid is a gruelling test for any world to endure."

traits.locale_text: «Es una señal de que la defensa de Dargonus estaba bien organizada. Una incursión Drukhari es una prueba atroz para cualquier planeta».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「ダルゴナスの防衛は比較的うまくいったという一例に過ぎん。デュカーリの襲撃はどの星にとっても耐えがたい過酷な試練だ」
languages.original_text: "It's a sign that the defence of Dargonus was organised relatively effectively. A Drukhari raid is a gruelling test for any world to endure."

traits.locale_text: 「ダルゴナスの防衛は比較的うまくいったという一例に過ぎん。デュカーリの襲撃はどの星にとっても耐えがたい過酷な試練だ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Es ist ein Zeichen, dass die Verteidigung von Dargonus relativ effektiv organisiert war. Ein Drukhari-Angriff ist für jede Welt eine grausame Prüfung."
languages.original_text: "It's a sign that the defence of Dargonus was organised relatively effectively. A Drukhari raid is a gruelling test for any world to endure."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist ein Zeichen, dass die Verteidigung von Dargonus relativ effektiv organisiert war. Ein Drukhari-Angriff ist für jede Welt eine grausame Prüfung."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "It's a sign that the defence of Dargonus was organised relatively effectively. A Drukhari raid is a gruelling test for any world to endure."

languages.text: "Dargonus'un savunmasının nispeten iyi organize edildiğinin işaretidir. Drukhari baskınları, her dünyanın göğüs germesi gereken, zorlu birer sınavdır."
languages.original_text: "It's a sign that the defence of Dargonus was organised relatively effectively. A Drukhari raid is a gruelling test for any world to endure."

traits.locale_text: "Dargonus'un savunmasının nispeten iyi organize edildiğinin işaretidir. Drukhari baskınları, her dünyanın göğüs germesi gereken, zorlu birer sınavdır."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
